name: @tmdjr/service-nestjs-assessment-test-contracts
description: Types & runtime enums generated from NGX service-nestjs-assessment-test spec

scripts.gen:models: openapi --input ../../openapi.json --output ./src --client none --exportCore false --exportServices false --exportModels true --useUnionTypes true
scripts.gen: npm run gen:types && npm run gen:models
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run gen && npm run build
